name: Send Zonka Feedback email surveys from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically send an email survey in Zonka Feedback. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mYguf5D2J3A_rE7WMe6kRm4mRsQ4JMprgE7zZLb66Us/edit?usp=sharing).
